mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_nm, post_content, cat_idx, wanted, m_idx) VALUES (#{post_nm}, #{post_content}, #{cat_idx}, #{wanted}, #{m_idx});
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET post_nm = #{post_nm}, post_content = #{post_content}, post_editdate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE post_idx = #{post_idx};
mapper.select: select p.post_idx, post_nm, post_content, post_regdate, post_editdate, p.cat_idx, c.cat_nm, m_idx, match_yn from post p left join category c on p.cat_idx=c.cat_idx left join dream.match m on p.post_idx=m.post_idx where p.post_idx=#{idx}
select count(*) from post where m_idx=#{m_idx} and wanted=#{wanted}

select p.post_idx, p.post_nm, p.m_idx, c.cat_idx, c.cat_nm, member.loc_idx, loc.loc_nm, m.match_yn from post p left join category c on p.cat_idx=c.cat_idx left join member on p.m_idx=member.m_idx left join loc on member.loc_idx=loc.loc_idx left join dream.match m on p.post_idx=m.post_idx where p.post_deldate is null and p.m_idx!=#{m_idx} and p.wanted=#{wanted} and p.cat_idx=#{cat_idx} and member.loc_idx=#{loc_idx} order by post_regdate desc
